00065 typedef struct eolComponent_S
00066 {
00067   eolUint       id;
00068   eolWord       name;
00069   eolRectFloat  rect;
00070   eolRect       bounds;
00071   eolBool       canHasFocus;    
00072   eolBool       hasFocus;
00073   eolInt        state;
00074   eolInt        oldState;
00075   eolUint       type;
00076   void        * componentData;
00077   void          (*data_free)(struct eolComponent_S *component);
00078   void          (*data_draw)(struct eolComponent_S *component,eolRect bounds);
00079   eolBool       (*data_update)(struct eolComponent_S *component);
00080   eolInt        (*data_get_state)(struct eolComponent_S *component);
00081   eolBool       (*data_changed)(struct eolComponent_S *component);
00082 }eolComponent;
